articles.description: This came after the government reduced the windfall tax on diesel and aviation fuel shipments by Rs 2 a litre and scrapped completely a Rs 6-per litre levy on gasoline exports. The government also cut the tax on domestically produced crude by 27 per cent to R…
articles.content: Foreign brokerage Morgan Stanley said oil refiners such as , Oil India and will see a reduction in overhang and equity valuations and should start pricing in high sustainable energy margins as govern… [+1805 chars]
